name: Strange Shapes (BROWSER VERSION)
description:
You are a square trying to become a circle once again. Thanks to anyone that donated to the project!

ps. sorry if there are any glitches im a first time developer and this is my first real project. im also a kid developer so this is my first time publishing anything aswell.

Bug fixes June 10th: Fixed the bug where video settings would say audio settings instead

Additions June 10th: Added the border animation to the main menu. added flag poles at the end of world 2 level 6.

If anyone finds a bug or has something to recommend just type in down in the comments and ill most likely add it or fix it!
